definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: It points out that the ratio of numbers of line segments between chords and secants is 2 under a same precision.
sentences.chinese: 它指出在同样精度下弦线段数与割线段数之比是2。

sentences.english: The moon is in its last quarter.
And there was the big 3)old moon, hanging right in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 挂在我眼前的，仍旧是那轮大大的下弦月。

sentences.english: And there was the big 3)old moon, true religion jeans for cheap, hanging right in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 挂在我面前的，仍然是那轮大大的下弦月。

definition: to wind/to tighten/crescent moon/first quarter or waxing moon
widowed/lit. broken string, cf 琴瑟[qin2 se4] qin and se, two instruments epitomizing marital harmony
bright moon/refers to 夜明珠, a legendary pearl that can glow in the dark/CL:輪|轮[lun2]
